name: Challenging Dogfights
description:
Take control of the US planes at the World War II, fight against deadly enemies! Control various American aircrafts at various maps from cities to oceans. Play through several challenging missions with unique objectives, alongside a free-play mode with the desired map, aircraft and difficulty. Compete with other players on the Steam leaderboards.

Features:
Various missions with objectives to play with.
Free-play mode with 2 difficulty options.
7 different real WWII aircrafts.
4 different maps.
Decent musics and effects.
